mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BBS_COMM (BBS_COMM_NO, BBS_NO, COMM_CONTENT, COMM_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO) VALUES (BBS_COMM_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{bbsNo}, #{commContent}, SYSDATE, 1, 0, BBS_COMM_SEQ.CURRVAL)
mapper.select: SELECT A.ROW_NUM, A.BBS_COMM_NO, A.BBS_NO, A.COMM_CONTENT, A.COMM_CREATE_DATE, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUP_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GROUP_NO DESC, DEPTH ASC) AS ROW_NUM, BBS_COMM_NO, BBS_NO, COMM_CONTENT, COMM_CREATE_DATE, STATE, DEPTH, GROUP_NO FROM BBS_COMM WHERE BBS_NO = #{bbsNo}) A WHERE A.ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
